reviewText: Exceptional performances by the three leads makes this an enjoyable time-filler. Travel back to 1979 and be entertained.

I certainly loved Torn Between Two Lovers. Especially since I wrote this movie in 1978 and I have been looking for a video copy for years. For TV buffs, I wrote this with my friend Doris Silverton and both our names are on the video box, even though they spelled my name wrong. Even this review box spells it wrong

HI, I watched this movie because Nick Mancuso was said to be in it.  He was not in it.  It is a good movie regardless, but misleading to have him listed in the cast.
